summary: Advanced task task-20260301-001 by adding cadence-state reporting for the doorstep scan workflow, so twice-daily execution now exposes due-now/overdue/next-slot signals without writing fake observations. Local context/location evidence: `date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z %A'` => `2026-03-01T15:03:56+1000 Sunday`; `readlink /etc/localtime` => `/var/db/timezone/zoneinfo/Australia/Brisbane` (location confidence: medium, timezone-level only). Hardware dependency status: `imagesnap -l` => `No video devices found.` so machine-observed doorstep sensing remains unavailable. Code/files changed: updated `src/wdib/control/doorstep_scan.py` with new `cadence_status(...)`, `--status-only` CLI mode, and cadence status in normal run output; expanded `tests/test_wdib_doorstep_scan.py` with cadence-state and status-only tests; updated `devices/e60d3087-aaf7-42e9-b065-ca27f278f4b2/runtime/doorstep_scan/protocol.md` with status command and interpretation rules. Verification evidence: `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m unittest tests/test_wdib_doorstep_scan.py tests/test_wdib_reducer.py tests/test_wdib_hardware_probe.py` => `Ran 11 tests ... OK`; `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m wdib.control.doorstep_scan --log-path devices/e60d3087-aaf7-42e9-b065-ca27f278f4b2/runtime/doorstep_scan/scan_log_$(date +%F).ndjson --status-only` => `remaining_slots_today=["morning","evening"]`, `overdue_slots_today=["morning"]`, `next_slot="evening"`; `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m wdib.control.doorstep_scan --log-path devices/e60d3087-aaf7-42e9-b065-ca27f278f4b2/runtime/doorstep_scan/scan_log_2026-03-01.ndjson --status-only --now 2026-03-01T18:10:00+10:00` => `should_scan_now=true`, `current_window_slot="evening"`; worker-result contract validated via `PYTHONPATH=src python3 ... validate_payload(..., "worker_result.schema.json")` => `worker_result_schema_valid`.
